description: Golden set for review processing evaluation

input.title: Metro... In Dino Review
input.summary: You can read the rest of the review here: This is a good movie about relationships in the city. BR says it's interesting but lacking emotional connection. Copyright 2025 GALATTA.
input.full_review: Anurag Basu's Metro In Dino is an interesting and ambitious experiment. The film is about a number of characters in a number of relationship conflicts. Some are treated seriously, some are treated comically, and there's definitely a vision. But the film stays at a distance and we end up feeling very little. There's no emotional connection with any of these characters.

expected.cleaned_short_review: Anurag Basu's ambitious experiment about relationship conflicts in the city. Some treated seriously, some comically, with a clear vision - but it stays at a distance with no emotional connection.

input.title: 3BHK Movie Review - Spoilers Ahead
input.summary: SPOILERS AHEAD. The film showcases middle class dreams. You can watch the trailer here: link. Baradwaj Rangan says it's well-made.
input.full_review: Sri Ganesh's 3BHK is a well-made drama starring Siddharth and Sarathkumar that showcases the middle class by focusing on their one big dream - owning a home. Shiva, Grace Antony, and Mithul Ryan play an urban family that learns to fly away. The sweet, gentle, musical feel of the film makes even the feel-bad moments of life seem like a feel-good experience.

expected.cleaned_short_review: Sri Ganesh's well-made drama about middle class dreams of home ownership. A sweet, gentle, musical film that makes even feel-bad moments seem like a feel-good experience.

input.title: My Trip to Goa - Travel Diary 2024
input.full_review: Last week I visited Goa with my family. The beaches were pristine and the seafood was amazing. We stayed at a lovely resort near Baga beach. Highly recommend visiting during off-season for fewer crowds. The sunsets were breathtaking and the local markets had great deals on souvenirs.

expected.cleaned_title: My Trip to Goa - Travel Diary

input.title: Paranthu Po Film Review - Copyright 2024
input.summary: The rest of this review may contain spoilers. Ram's road movie is beautiful and kind. You can read the complete review here: website link. Copyright notice applies.
input.full_review: Ram's Paranthu Po is a beautiful, kind, funny road movie about the ups and downs of life. The readily identifiable story is about moving out of rented houses and buying a home. And despite the many issues faced by the family, the director ensures that the film is an easy, pleasant watch. It's a heartwarming journey that resonates with anyone who has dreamed of owning their own place.

expected.cleaned_short_review: Ram's beautiful, kind, funny road movie about life's ups and downs. A heartwarming journey about the dream of home ownership that remains an easy, pleasant watch despite the challenges.

input.title: Review: Inception (2010) - A Mind-Bending Masterpiece | FilmBlog
input.full_review: Christopher Nolan delivers another cerebral thriller that challenges viewers to question the nature of reality. The film follows Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who extracts secrets from people's dreams. With stunning visuals, a complex narrative structure, and Hans Zimmer's iconic score, Inception is a must-watch for any cinema enthusiast. The ending will leave you thinking for days.

expected.cleaned_short_review: Christopher Nolan's cerebral thriller challenges viewers to question reality. With stunning visuals, complex narrative, and iconic score, this dream-heist film is a must-watch that will leave you thinking for days.
